description: The Melon™️ approves of this fine software
summary: This is a Certified Hood Classic

description: The Melon approves. But in all seriousness, this is really handy since now it doesn't mess with regular Dolphin's install like it does normally, so thanks guys
This is the best way to play the Metroid Prime Trilogy on PCs hands down.

Have you found a mirror? Look into it. You see that person? That person knows. That person knows the best way to play the best game that there ever was. If it's not the best game that there ever was, then you are trapped on the wrong side of the mirror. Reach out to yourself, but beware! Your better self may not want to swap places with you. You may need to spit some bars of charm. Be primed and ready for the ultimate experience. You may have just earned it by getting to the end of this absolute waffle you've just read :D

Mouse not working:
The linux mouse pointer apears on top of the emulator, recentering all the time.
Mouse bottons are not registered by the emulator, unless the mouse focus is on the desktop.

Video options:
Resolution, antialias, etc do not apply.

Sound:
No sound whatsoever.
after update the emulator frequently crashes
At the current version the app doesn't even launch. Usually works great though.
